translations.translation: Then We brought the others to that place.
We also brought the other party close to the same spot,
We sent a revelation to Moses saying, "Strike the sea with your staff." The sea was rent asunder and each side stood high up like a huge mountain.
And We brought the others close to that place.
Then We brought near the others to that place.
And We brought near, there, the others.
And there We brought the others on,
Then brought We near the others to that place.
In the meantime We made the others approach that place.
And We brought near thither the others.
There, We brought the others near,
And We made the other party approach thither.
Then We brought near the others [Fir'aun's (Pharaoh) party] to that place.
And there We brought the others on,
And there We brought the others near.
And We advanced thereto the pursuers.
[26:64] And there We brought near the others, Pharaoh and his folk, until they followed them across the same paths.
(Then brought We near the others to that place) then We kept Pharaoh and his people in the cloud, and it is said in the sea, and all of them were disbelievers.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَأَزْلَفْنَا ثَمَّ ٱلآخَرِينَ } معناه جَمَعْنَا

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَ } بعدما دخلوا في شعاب البحر المنغلق { أَزْلَفْنَا } وقربنا { ثَمَّ ٱلآخَرِينَ } [الشعراء: 64] أي: فرعون وقومه، وهم أيضاً وصلوا على شاطئ البحر فرأوهم في شعابه على العبور، فاقتحموا أثرهم مطمعين النجاة مثلهم
